sentences.english: He slipped into his coat and went out.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷地套上外衣，跑到外面去了。

sentences.english: Would you like a cover for your coat?
sentences.chinese: 需要罩子蓋住您的外衣嗎？

sentences.english: John was clothed in camel's hair and wore a leather garment around his waist.
sentences.chinese: 若翰身穿駱駝毛外衣，腰間束著皮帶。

sentences.english: A sealant is a non-organic based coating used to seal paint with a thin barrier.
sentences.chinese: 密封膠是無機性外衣用於油漆密封。

sentences.english: Put on your coat if your feel cold.
The coat has two pockets on each side.
sentences.chinese: 這件外衣的兩側各有一個小兜兜。

sentences.english: Mr Green reached down his coat from the clothes stand.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生從衣架上取下外衣。

sentences.english: He told me to put on my cloak and run to Gimmerton for the doctor and the parson.
sentences.chinese: 他叫我穿上外衣，趕緊跑到吉默吞去請醫生和牧師。

sentences.english: He washed the dirt from his coat.
sentences.chinese: 他洗去外衣上的髒東西。

sentences.english: The two coats are of the same colour.
18They divide my garments among them and cast lots for my clothing.
sentences.chinese: 他們分我的外衣，爲我的裏衣拈鬮。

sentences.english: If the company does not have a dress code, remember that its better to overdress than underdress.
sentences.chinese: 如果公司沒有着裝，記住其更好地外衣比內衣。

sentences.english: Mary burned a hole in her dress.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗在外衣上燒了一個洞。

sentences.english: Schistosomes also possess what seems to be a cloak of invisibility: an unusual covering known as the tegument .
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲還有一種如同隱形披風的特殊外衣，稱爲體壁。

sentences.english: In the winter, perspiration permeated through all over his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 冬天時，他的汗從內裏透出外衣，汗漬斑斑。

sentences.english: A car ran past, spotting my coat with mud.
sentences.chinese: 一輛汽車駛過，給我的外衣濺上了泥點。

definition: to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
to take off (trousers)/to drop one's pants
to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment/burqa
to wrap tightly/to wind tightly/to bind/close-fitting (clothes)
to wrap up/to bind up/bundle/parcel/package/CL:個|个[ge4]
